title: Rekia Boyd and the Chicago Police Department's International Reign of Terror, Part 1
itunes:title: Rekia Boyd and the Chicago Police Department's International Reign of Terror, Part 1
description:
Christopher Wong sits down with Raven, a Chicago journalist, to discuss the cops' murder of Rekia Boyd and how the cop who murdered her trained death squads.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
